name: Angola chama seu povo
lyrics: Angola chama seu povo Chama eu, chama Oi chama de um a um Chama eu, chama Era eu, era meu mano Chama eu, chama O, colega meu, era ele, era eu Chama eu, chama Angola chama seu povo Chama eu, chama Angola chama seu povo Chama eu, chama E vai chamando um a um Chama eu, chama E vai cantando um a um Chama eu, chama

translations.text: Angola is calling Angola players is calling me call after call is calling me It's me, it's my brother is calling me Oh! My partner, is (calling) him, is (calling) me is calling me Angola is calling Angola players is calling me Angola is calling Angola players is calling me go (get them) one by one is calling me Go (find everyone) and sing one by one is calling me

descriptions.text:
【Singing Timing】 When playing Angola game or wanting to call someone
Seu pove literally means "his people", and in this whole sentence it refers to the call to Angoleiro when the rhythm of Angola is played.
